MS MCQs

    Gather metrics from your Azure Blob Storage containers

    »

    1. Which of the following is not a valid blob type in Azure Storage?

      Page blob

      Append blob

      Text blob

      Block blob


    2. Which one of the following chart types works best with data that varies rapidly over time?

      Line

      Area

      Bar

      Scatter


    3. Which of the following types of content cannot be added to a dashboard Markdown tile?

      Video

      Basic HTML

      Markdown

      JavaScript


    4. Which of the following security principals can access shared dashboards in Azure?

      Only individual internal user assignments

      Internal users, assigned individually and as part of a security group

      Internal users and external users assigned individually

      Internal users, individually and as part of a security group, and external users


    5. Which services is Azure Storage Analytics logging available for?

      Blob Storage only

      Blob Storage and Queue Storage

      Blob Storage, Queue Storage, and Table Storage

      Blob Storage, Queue Storage, and Azure Files
